channel.title: CVE Feed for Fortinet -- FortiTester
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Fortinet -- FortiTester

item.title: CVE-2023-36642|2023-09-13T12:29:26.198Z -- fortinet -- fortitester
item.description: An improper neutralization of special elements used in an OS command vulnerability [CWE-78] in the management interface of FortiTester 3.0.0 through 7.2.3 may allow an authenticated attacker to execute unauthorized commands via specifically crafted arguments to existing commands.

item.title: CVE-2023-40717|2023-09-13T12:29:45.466Z -- fortinet -- fortitester
item.description: A use of hard-coded credentials vulnerability [CWE-798] in FortiTester 2.3.0 through 7.2.3 may allow an attacker who managed to get a shell on the device to access the database via shell commands.

item.title: CVE-2023-40716|2023-12-13T06:44:03.852Z -- fortinet -- fortitester
item.description: An improper neutralization of special elements used in an OS command vulnerability [CWE-78] in the command line interpreter of FortiTester 2.3.0 through 7.2.3 may allow an authenticated attacker to execute unauthorized commands via specifically crafted arguments when running execute restore/backup .

item.title: CVE-2023-40715|2023-09-13T12:29:50.478Z -- fortinet -- fortitester
item.description: A cleartext storage of sensitive information vulnerability [CWE-312] in FortiTester 2.3.0 through 7.2.3 may allow an attacker with access to the DB contents to retrieve the plaintext password of external servers configured in the device.
